trans-unit.source:
Default-Left - Aligns the text to the left
Right - Aligns the text to the right]
Center - Centers the text
Justify - Stretches the lines so that each line has equal width

Container - The image element inside the section with a specific width. Usually, it's up to 1200px based on the Bootstrap grid. Useful to render images not more than 1200px width for better performance.
Container-fluid - The image element inside the section with a fluid/full-screen width. 100% width based on the Bootstrap grid. Lower performance, but with the ability to design site with a full-screen layout.
